name: h3
description: The 2024 Louisville Slugger Select PWR Drop 5 USA Baseball Bat is a top choice for players seeking performance and power. Certified by USSSA with a 1.15 BPF stamp, this bat features a balanced swing feel and hybrid construction, combining an alloy barrel with a composite handle. The 2 5/8 inch EXD Alloy Barrel offers a huge sweet spot and premium pop, while the VCX2 Connection reduces vibration for enhanced comfort. With its SPD-Gen2 End Cap and power swing weight, this bat maximizes barrel performance, momentum, and distance. The striking orange, blue, and black colorway complements the LS Pro Comfort Grip, providing the perfect mix of tack and cushion for an exceptional playing experience. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
